subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Citi Field (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: On Friday night, major league players and coaches will start assessing what two rookies — the new Yankee Stadium and Citi Field — have got. How they play, their quirks, their character.
snippet: On Friday night, major league players and coaches will start assessing what two rookies — the new Yankee Stadium and Citi Field — have got. How they play, their quirks, their character.
